meanings.sent1: The venose leaves of the plant were easy to spot.
meanings.sent2: Her hands looked venose under the bright light.
meanings.sent3: The venose pattern on the marble floor made it look like a treasure map.
meanings.sent4: The venose cracks in the wall seemed to tell a story of its own.
meanings.sent5: The venose appearance of the tree bark gave it a unique texture.

meanings.definition: Resembling or having the characteristics of veins.
meanings.sent1: The venose patterns on the butterfly's wings were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The venose design on the fabric added an elegant touch to the dress.
meanings.sent3: The venose lines on the painting seemed to come alive when viewed from different angles.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a venose quality that made it look like flowing rivers.
meanings.sent5: The venose structure of the rock formation hinted at its ancient origins.
